revised_title: Nitric Oxide Synthase Inhibition and its Impact on Octopus Learning
tldr: The study investigates the effects of nitric oxide synthase inhibition on octopus touch learning. Researchers found that l-NAME, a blocker of nitric oxide synthase, impairs touch learning in octopuses without affecting sensory or motor functions. This suggests that nitric oxide synthase plays a role in the central structures involved in touch learning.
